title: Fragile Flakes
body: Its good to see the overly sensitive people in the world playing games and most of them seem to now live on league. Love an environment where any foul language or 1 simple insult is "flaming" or "raging". After 6 years I can be happy to leave this community behind me.

replies.body:

You can curse all you fucking want to as long as you're not cursing AT someone. The insults I'll grant you though -- but, unlike cursing, and insult exists solely to offend someone else, and yeah, that behavior will get you punished.
What about saying "tf are you doing" ?
